title: Generous People Needed!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
Could someone please gift me Xayah as I am broke af. I don't have the time or money to buy her but i would love to play her. Add me: Fate Fall
Thanks :)

replies.body:
When you burn 12k IP on yourself and your main duo then you find another poor soul who cannot afford xayah :(

i would gift you but im all out of IP now
Haha I know. Champ prices FeelsBadMan. Thanks anyway :)
